259 DOA: Republicans Reject Democrats' One-Year ACA Extension To End Shutdown (www.zerohedge.com) posted 5 days ago by Sea_Still 20 comments award share report block DOA: Republicans Reject Democrats' One-Year ACA Extension To End Shutdown ZeroHedge - On a long enough timeline, the survival rate for everyone drops to zero www.zerohedge.com

Literally what happened. I honestly do not know why you’re such a nasty faggot. I gave my guess on what is going to happen and you decided to just be a humongous nasty faggot. I even clarified when I shouldn't have, given you’re too fucking retarded to think abstractly like some 70 IQ mentally retarded ape. Why even be here if you’re gonna be a belligerent retard that lashes out at people for no good damn reason. Ok doomer is just shitting out nonsense. Why don’t you try to have a fucking conversation with back and forth instead of doing this shit and run faggotry. permalink parent award report block reply view 1 more comments...
